text: Motion
Motion
Come to think of it, what happened to that sword?
I stored it in the closet!
Until the day comes, I'll seal it again...!

I see.
So the hero's sword gathers power until its next adventure.
...It might shrink again the next time we use it, huh?

Ah!
R-Really...!

If I could properly become an adult,
that sword would shrink again...!
What do you think about that, Kaho?
Huh...?

Do you feel anything about something you
love gradually getting smaller?

Well... um...
When I first saw it, I was a little surprised...?

...
But, that doesn't change the sword!

Even when it gets smaller, it's still sparkly and cool,
and it gave me strength during the live performances!

So, when I unseal it again,
it's the same as it was in kindergarten and now!

If I say I've grown bigger again,
it'll still play with me the same way!
I see...

Then, until we meet again next time,
you have to become an even bigger Kaho Komiya.
Yes!
